channel.title: Projects on Ramin's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ramin's Homepage

item.title: CenterFusion
item.description: A center-based radar and camera fusion for 3D object detection in autonomous vehicles.

item.title: Radar Region Proposal Network
item.description: Radar Region Proposal Network (RRPN) uses Radar detections in an autonomous vehicle to generate real-time region proposals for two-stage object detection networks.

item.title: Radar-Camera Sensor Fusion and Depth Estimation
item.description: A novel radar-camera sensor fusion framework for accurate object detection and distance estimation in autonomous vehicles.

item.title: EcoCAR Mobility Challenge
item.description: The EcoCAR Mobility Challenge tasks 12 North American universities to apply advanced propulsion systems, electrification, SAE Level 2 automation, and vehicle connectivity to improve the energy efficiency of a 2019 Chevrolet Blazer.

item.title: EcoCAR 3
item.description: EcoCAR3 challenged 16 North American university teams to redesign a 2016 Chevrolet Camaro. The ADAS team focused on integrating the sensing system on the Camaro and deploy driver feedback to improve efficiency and safety.

item.title: Spacenet 3: Road Network Detection
item.description: The Spacenet 3 challenge is focused on determining road networks and routing information directly from satellite imagery. The SpaceNet 3 Dataset contains ~8,000 km of roads across the four SpaceNet Areas of Interest.

item.title: IARPA fMoW Challenge
item.description: The IARPA Functional Map of the World (fMoW) challenge focuses on promoting research in object identification and classification to automatically identify facility, building, and land use from satellite imagery. The dataset consists of 4- and 8-band multispectral images in 63 categories.
